Attribute.Name: fontfamily
Attribute.RegularExpressionValidation: ^(andale mono|arial|arial black|book antiqua|comic sans ms|courier new|georgia|helvetica|impact|symbol|tahoma|terminal|times new roman|times|verdana|webdings|wingdings)$

Language.Sentence: Incorrect value, must be either 0 or 1

Fade effect, time is indicated in milliseconds
Order of rendering the object on the page. By default the value of hierarchy is 0, that means, that the object will be rendered in the order it is written in the XML-file of the VDOM application.
Incorrect value, must be even integer from 0 to 99.
Incorrect value, must be either 0 or 1.

Position in visual hierarchy of objects. If you have several objects in one container situated on each other, the z-index indicates the order of their displaying. The larger z-index is, the upper the object lies.
Incorrect value, must be positive integer from 0 to 9999.
Spacing between the top edge of the container and the object in pixels.
Incorrect value, must be positive integer from 0 to 9999.
Spacing between the left edge of the container and the object in pixels.
Incorrect value, must be positive integer from 0 to 9999.
Width of the object in pixels.
Incorrect value, must be positive integer from 0 to 999999.
Height of the object in pixels.
Incorrect value, must be positive integer.
Define if the text is underlined or not.
Color of the object's text. It represents an HTML color code (for example, #FFFFFF - white, #FF0000 - red).

Type.SourceCode:
class VDOM_text(VDOM_object): def render(self, parent, contents=""): font=[ self.fontweight if self.fontweight=="bold" else None, self.fontstyle if self.fontstyle=="italic" else None, "%spx"%self.fontsize or "12px", self.fontfamily or None] style_zindex = u"z-index:%s;" % self.zindex if int(self.zindex) <> 0 else u"" style={ "display": "none" if self.visible=="0" else None, "position": self.position, "overflow": "auto", "top": "%spx"%self.top, "left": "%spx"%self.left, "width": "%spx"%self.width, "text-align": self.align or None, "font": " ".join(filter(None, font)), "color" : "#%s"%self.color if self.color else None, "text-decoration": self.textdecoration or None} if VDOM_CONFIG_1["DEBUG"] == "1": debug_info = u"objtype='text' objname='%s' ver='2011-12-06'" % self.name else: debug_info = u"" result="
%(value)s
"%{ "zind": style_zindex, "debug_info": debug_info, "id": self.id_special, "style": "; ".join(["%s: %s"%(key, value) for key, value in style.iteritems() if value]), "css": "; %s"%self.css if self.css else "", "classname": self.classname, "value": self.value} return VDOM_object.render(self, parent, contents=result) def wysiwyg(self, parent, contents=""): value=""%self.value if self.value else "" fontsize="fontsize=\"%s\""%self.fontsize if self.fontsize else "" editable="value,color,fontfamily,fontsize,fontstyle,fontweight,align,textdecoration" result=""\ "%s"\ "%s"%( self.id, self.visible, self.zindex, self.hierarchy, self.order, self.top, self.left, self.width, 0, 0, self.width, self.color, self.fontstyle, self.fontweight, self.fontfamily, fontsize, self.align, self.textdecoration, editable, value, contents) return VDOM_object.wysiwyg(self, parent, contents=result)
